#summary Golf Markup Language Reference: complexType StrokeDetail.
#sidebar TOCSchema

== Name ==

[CStrokeDetail StrokeDetail]
===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--StrokeDetail (restriction)
}}}
    
----
  	
===  Documentation ===

        
			Elements used to record details about a golf stroke.
		
----
      
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
----
  	
===  Model ===

	<...  `drop`=xs:boolean  `number`=xs:nonNegativeInteger>
            ( player? ; position? ; time? ; golf-club? ; landing? ; distance? ; precision? ; distance-to-hole? ; note? ) 
  </...>
----
  		      
=== Attributes ===

|| *Name* || *Description* || *Type* || *Use* || *Default* || *Fixed* || *Form* ||
|| drop ||  				Boolean flag indicating if the stroke was a drop.			 || xs:boolean || optional ||  ||  || unqualified ||
|| number ||  				Order number of the stroke playing the hole.			 || xs:nonNegativeInteger || optional ||  ||  || unqualified ||

=== Nested Elements ===

|| *Name* || *Description* || *Type* ||
|| distance ||  											Distance of the stroke.					 || golfml:LengthWithUnits ||
|| distance-to-hole ||  											Distance left to the hole BEFORE the stroke.					 || golfml:LengthWithUnits ||
|| golf-club ||  					Golf club used for stroke.				 || golfml:REF_GolfClub ||
|| landing ||  					Information on landing are of stroke.				 || golfml:GolfCourseAreaTypeEnum ||
|| note ||  Comment about the stroke || golfml:Note ||
|| player ||  					Name of the player who actually stroked the ball					in best-ball, four-ball or other similar team competition.				 || xs:string ||
|| position ||  					Position FROM where the stroke take place.				 || golfml:Position ||
|| precision ||  					Information on the precision of the stroke regarding distance and direction.				 || golfml:StrokePrecision ||
|| time ||  					Time of stroke.				 || xs:dateTime ||

----
  		
===  Local Usage ===
    	[CStrokes Strokes]
